name: frontend
description: `npm install -g gulp` #### 3. Install gulp in your project devDependencies `npm install --save-dev gulp` #### 4. Install the required gulp plugins `npm install --save-dev gulp-util gulp-sass gulp-minify-css gulp-rename gulp-autoprefixer browser-sync` #### 5. Run gulp tasks in your project's root to generate css or watch the files for modication (it automatically generates css by modification) * `gulp sass` or just `gulp` * `gulp watch`
